question:
Which among the following incidents took place during the viceroyalty of Lord Linlithgow?
1. Forward Bloc was established
2. Pakistan proposal was adopted by Muslim League
3. The "Day of Deliverance" was celebrated by Muslim League
4. Subhas Chandra Bose left India
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Forward Bloc was established in the year 1939 (22nd June). Pakistan proposal was adopted by the Muslim League (Lahore Conference 1940). The \"Day of Deliverance\" was celebrated by Muslim League on 22nd December 1939. Subhas Chandra Bose left India on 17 January 1941.
